abstract: Israeli Army reports that Palestinian man was shot after opening fire on Israeli forces in West Bank.
lead_paragraph: It was not clear whether the gunman was killed, and a spokesman for Israel’s military said the attack had occurred at a checkpoint in the Jordan Valley.

headline.main: Palestinian Shot After Opening Fire on Israeli Forces in West Bank
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Israel: Man Is Shot in West Bank After Opening Fire on Soldiers

snippet: It was not clear whether the gunman was killed, and a spokesman for Israel’s military said the attack had occurred at a checkpoint in the Jordan Valley.
